video_title: Marc  Harvey-Hill (Nethermind) - Accelerating Ethereum’s rollup roadmap
description: This talk will dive into Nethermind’s Surge rollup and its role in supercharging Ethereum’s rollup roadmap. We’ll explore how Surge is driving innovations in based rollups, unpacking developments in security, performance, and decentralisation.
